name: Barrier Trail
description:
A puzzlescript game about cubes that beam out barriers with a trail being created behind the player.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=b99375717b1a5fd04b993d5817db6ec2

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=b99375717b1a5fd04b993d5817db6ec2

This game is based off a previous game I made called 'Cubes barrier': rosden.itch.io/cubes-barrier

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
